question: What is the name of the sustainable fashion project which was launched by the Union Minister for Textiles Smriti Zubin Irani in Mumbai?
explanation: The name of the sustainable fashion project which was launched by the Union Minister for Textiles Smriti Zubin Irani in Mumbai is Sustainable Resolution (SU.RE). The project was jointly managed by the Clothing Manufacturers Association of India and IMG Reliance.
